svg,#simplero-section-1662982399752 .clp_theme .skill--icon svg{fill:#eeeeee} Open Positions Technical Support Hero Staff/Senior Engineers Senior Product Designer Who We Are We're Simplero. We believe in making things simpler. Simpler to start & grow a business. Simpler to connect with people & transform their lives. Simpler to transform your own. We're a good mix of talented and caring people from all over the world, who support each other in making a fantastic product and provide exceptional customer service (just check our Trustpilot reviews), and making things simpler for our customers. As a company, we don't take a political or activist stances, although our founder has been known to voice a strong opinion or two. We don't all have to agree or try to make the world agree with anything. We're here to have fun, do great work, and to care for, learn from, and serve others. For 14 years, we've been running a profitable, bootstrapped, no-nonsense business focused on simple. We don't plan on taking on VC money, and we don't plan to exit. We're building a company we want to work at every single day. A place that allows us to do meaningful work that impacts people in a real way. Our stakeholders are our founder, our team, and our customers. Simple. Who You Are You're talented, skilled, kind, friendly, and excited to make a difference. You're great at what you do, and you love learning new things and improving your skills, your mindset, and your way of being. You're self-aware, and curious about others. We don't care about your background, where you come from, what you look like, or where you live. Only who you are and the work you do today, and who you're becoming. What It's Like to Work Here It's simple. We offer a very supportive, low-stress environment. No internal games, politics or backstabbing. No red tape or heavy-handed process. We put a lot of love and care into what we do. We're craftsmen, creators, makers. We take pride and joy in the work we do, and it shows. It's an environment where you're trusted to manage yourself, and given the resources and support to do your best work. We do a lot of project based work in small cross-functional teams, with innovation, creativity, brainstorming, and quick and collective decision making. We trust (and need) everyone to bring their own insight and judgment to work. The person closes to the work often has the best ideas, and the best vantage point to come up with breakthrough insights that make things simpler. Benefits Laptop or other gear you need to be productive. (up to $1500, yours to keep after one year) Audible membership Flexible schedule Remote work in a remote-first company Amazing team support and community Full access to Simplero's internal training library—tons of cool stuff to learn about Free-for-life Simplero account For full-time team members also: 4 weeks of paid vacation per year, increasing to 5 after three years 10 sick/health/wellness days 10 national holidays Wellness stipend to help pay for your gym Health stipend for US-based team members Core Values Make it simpler(o) Simple is hard to do, but oh so awesome when you get it right. It requires creativity, maybe even a stroke of genius, and patience to let the right idea gestate. When done right, it the outcome is not just simple, but elegantly simple. Growth Mindset Always looking for ways to improve and be better, whether it's the product, our communication, our processes, or ourselves. Not because we hate what is. Because we love making it better. Real Talk We relate to others like they're people. We care and we're real with them. We tell the truth, to ourselves and to others. We own both our mistakes and our wins. the job and your company profile - be sure to include your location restrictions if you have 'em!\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp\u003e If you've posted with us before, you may choose to only fill in your company name and email and the company information will be pulled in from your last posting. Be sure to be consistent with your company name! (Ex. 'Company Name Inc' vs 'Company Name')\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp\u003eSelect a plan. The base price for a job listing on RemoteAfrica is $99 per month. Choose one of our optional upgrades to raise the visibility of your listing.\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp\u003ePurchase the listing Preview your listing, go back and make changes if needed, and once you are ready to post it you can add your billing information. Then sit back and let the applications flood in!\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ol\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eAn account is created automatically with the provided email.\u003cbr/\u003eAll payments are processed securely by Paystack Nigeria.\u003c/p\u003e"},{"content":"Job postings on RemoteAfrica have a lifespan of 30 days.\u003cbr/\u003e At the end of the 30-day term, the job automatically renews to help make your hiring process more convenient - you can leave your job posting up for as long as you need to! If you only want to leave it up for one month, don't worry, you can easily turn the auto-renewal off anytime. We send an email reminder 5 days before so you don't forget.","order":2,"title":"How long does my job listing stay live for?","enabled":true},{"order":3,"content":" With auto-renewal turned on, listings will renew automatically every 30 days. But don't worry! You can turn this off through your account dashboard.","title":"What is the auto-renewal?","enabled":true},{"enabled":false,"title":"How do I change the billing details for my listings?","order":4,"content":"Billing details are linked to each job listing, this means every time you want to upload a new job listing, you need to add your billing details. \u003cbr/\u003e If you don't have any active job listing, there's no need to change your billing information on them, unless you want to reactivate them. \u003cbr/\u003e For the job listings that are active, just go to your dashboard, click on \u003cb\u003e'Edit Listing'\u003c/b\u003e and scroll down to where it says \"Update billing details.\""},{"title":"How do I edit my job posting?","enabled":true,"order":5,"content":"[Login](https://remoteafrica.io/manage-jobs) to your company dashboard to and make sure you're on the Manage Listings tab. Click on the edit link associated with the listing. \u003cbr/\u003e Don't forget! Listings stay live for 30 days and renew automatically at the end of 30 days unless the auto-renewal is cancelled. A reminder will be sent five days before the renewal date - keep an eye out for it! 👀"},{"content":"[Login](https://remoteafrica.io/manage-jobs) to your company dashboard and click on the \u003cb\u003e'Manage Auto-Renewal'\u003c/b\u003e link on the respective listing.","title":"How do I cancel my listing or auto-renewal?","enabled":true,"order":6},{"content":"**[Log in](https://remoteafrica.io/manage-jobs)** to your company dashboard to edit your listing(s). \u003cbr /\u003e Stats you can monitor: \u003cbr/\u003e - \u003ci\u003eUnique page views\u003c/i\u003e - The number of unique clicks on the \u003cb\u003e'Apply for job'\u003c/b\u003e button \u003cbr/\u003e Since we're not part of the application process, unfortunately, we're not privy to exactly how many applicants you've received. To see which applicants came from WWR, we recommend using a bit.ly link or tracking this through your ATS provider or Google Analytics.","order":7,"title":"Where can I see stats?","enabled":false},{"title":"Can I renew an expired listing?","order":8,"content":"[Login](https://remoteafrica.io/manage-jobs) to your company dashboard and click on the \u003cb\u003e'Renew listing'\u003c/b\u003e link on the respective listing.","enabled":false}],"jobSeekerFaq":[{"content":"RemoteAfrica is a job board aims at connecting African professionals with remote opportunties. RemoteAfrica is designed to be the one stop place for landing a job overseas or within Africa and hiring the best talk within Africa.","order":1,"title":"What is RemoteAfrica","enabled":true},{"enabled":true,"content":"RemoteAfrica was created to simplify job search for African professionals by removing jobs hiring in specifically locations like USA, Canada and more. \u003cbr/\u003e \u003cp class=\"indent\"\u003eWith the increase in foreign investments in African Startups across African countries like Nigeria, Kenya, Uganda and more, hiring talent within African countries has never been easier.\u003c/p\u003e","order":2,"title":"How is RemoteAfrica different from other job boards?"},{"content":"Explore our Job Categories and click on the jobs you're interested in and qualified for. \u003cbr/\u003e After you've read the job listing, click on the red button that says \"Apply for this position.\" \u003cp class =\"indent\"\u003eBased on the company's application process, you'll either be taken to their website or ATS link to apply for the position, or prompted to send your application through email.\u003c/p\u003e","order":3,"enabled":true,"title":"How do I apply for jobs on RemoteAfrica?"},{"content":"Hiring managers are busy! Sometimes you won't hear back from them. So, it's always a great practice to follow up after waiting a reasonable amount of time (general standard two weeks). And, remember, kindness always wins.","enabled":true,"title":"I've applied for a job and they haven't replied back, what should I do?","order":4},{"order":5,"content":"We are a remote-dedicated job board. That being said, not all jobs are fully remote in nature. Meaning, many companies have hiring restrictions that only allow them to hire in certain countries or time zones. If you see a job listing that's tied to a city or requires you to be in the office a few times a week, click on the 'Let us know!' button on the job posting to notify us.","title":"This job isn't actually remote. What do I do?","enabled":true},{"title":"I need to report a fraudulent job posting or company. What do I do?","order":6,"enabled":true,"content":"We take these very seriously! Click on the 'Let us know!' button on the job posting or send an email to **[support@remoteafrica.io](mailto:support@remoteafrica.io?subject=Fraudulent%20job%20posting%20or%20company) with** the link to the job posting."},{"content":"Not at all! You can still use the site without being logged in. myJobPortals.name: 10up
myJobPortals.content:
Skip to content

	
		Contact
					
										10up
			
				

		
			
				
				
				
				
			
			Toggle Main Navigation
		

		
		Home
About Us
Our Work
Giving Back
Blog
Contact
		


	


	
		
	
		
		Careers		
		
		What makes 10up a great place to work? Challenging projects, great clients, and a team that is truly better together.		
		watch the video
	
	
		
			
		
	
	    
		
		
			
			Close
		
	
    
		
										
			
			
				
										
													Challenge yourself											

											We’re not known because our team is big—we’re known because our team thinks big. We’re constantly challenging ourselves to grow and exceed our own expectations, individually and collectively. Nothing is more satisfying than finding the solution to a complex problem and then making it happen.
									
			
		
		
										

			
			
				
										
													A focus on service											
											The most important user experience at 10up is the way others experience us. We are motivated by helping our clients, colleagues, and community achieve success through a culture built on empathy and teamwork.
									
			
		
		
										

			
			
				
										
											Culture and community											
											With teamwork as our foundation, we inspire and challenge each other over Slack, video calls, and even good old-fashioned phone calls. We also know that we are a part of something bigger: you’ll find us contributing to open source projects and speaking at conferences and meet-ups around the globe.
									
			
		
		
										

			
			
				
										
													A global perspective											
											10up is a globally distributed, remote team across six continents and over 29 countries. Gender, ethnic, cultural, and geographic diversity affords us an uncommonly broad perspective and a creative edge.
									
			
		

		
			
				
					Help us make a better web!				

				We’re always on the lookout for self-starters who thrive on delivering great client experiences built with creative thinking, expertise, and fine craftsmanship. Open positions are listed below. All of our positions are remote and are open to candidates all around the globe (unless otherwise specified). If one of them sounds like a fit and you’re motivated to grow with a diverse team in a fast-paced, remote work environment, we’d love for you to apply!

				
					
						
							Benefits						
					
					
						
							
																		
																					Paid time off & holidays
																						Bonus opportunities
																						Professional development budget
																						Paid parental leave
																						Flexible work schedule
																						Annual all-team Summit!
																					
																				
																					Health Insurance (Regional)
																						Retirement Plans with Company Match (Regional)
																					
																	
						
					
				


			
		
        
            
                
		
			Positions We Hire For		

PromotedLead Front End DeveloperApply NowPromotedLead JavaScript Developer: ReactApply NowPromotedAssociate Director / Director of Account Strategy – U.S.Apply NowPromotedLead Visual Designer – Americas TeamApply NowPromotedSenior Digital Project ManagerApply NowPromotedSenior Visual Designer – Americas TeamApply NowExperience Design (XD) Team Lead – Americas TeamApply NowLead Web DeveloperApply NowSenior Programmatic StrategistApply NowLead UX Designer – Americas TeamApply NowSenior UX Designer – Americas TeamApply NowTeam Lead (Digital Project Management)Apply NowSenior Audience Growth Strategist (SEO, Analytics)Apply NowSenior Front End DeveloperApply NowAssociate Director of Business DevelopmentApply NowSenior JavaScript Developer: ReactApply NowFreelance Senior UI/UX Designer – EuropeApply NowSenior Systems EngineerApply Now
             
        
	



	
		Let's build something great
		
			
				
					
		                hire us		            
		        

            		    
		
	



	
		10up
		
			
				Privacy
				Careers
				Contact
			
			
				Twitter: @10up
				Facebook

View Openings   Our Values    PEOPLE We believe that people come before skills.    PASSION We believe that passion is priceless.    OPEN-SOURCE We are an open-source first team.    EXPERIENCES We don't just build tools, we create experiences.     We are a remote first team collaborating from muliple locations on Planet Earth, Milky Way.                  Technology We build developer tools in collaboration with our amazing OSS community. We are using a wide variety of technologies, coding-langauges, and we often love to craft our own tools (and open-source them). You can learn more about our tech stack, or even check our source-code. Open Positions      Developer Advocate (YouTube & Developer Education focused) - Europe     Remote    Full-time   Learn More      Full Stack Engineer - Integrations     Remote    Full-time   Learn More      Dream Job     Remote    Full-time / Part-time   Learn More      Full Stack Engineer     Remote    Full-time   Learn More     Benefits   🏠 100% Remote Our entire company is distributed, so we take remote work seriously. If you’d rather not work from home, we will cover the cost of a coworking or office space.   📈 Stock Options Get generous stock options for a company that is growing blazing fast and is backed by top VCs :)   🕰 Flexible Hours & Days We're a remote team working in different time zones, from UTC+06:00 to UTC-06:00. Choose the hours and days that work best for you!   🏥 Healthcare Employees receive generous medical, dental, vision, and life insurance. Full-time contractors will have the cost of healthcare factored into their salary. Our recruiting team can help confirm which applies to you.   ❤️ Github Sponsorship of Your Choice We would love to give an annual sponsorship to any GitHub project of your choice!   🎓 Learning Appwrite provides $3,000 USD for employees to attend conferences, take classes, or otherwise further their education.   ✈️ Gatherings We typically meet up couple times a year in person for work and fun! What will be our next location? NYC, London, LA, or Barcelona? Help us decide!   🖥 Top Notch Equipment Appwrite will let you choose a new laptop of your choice (up to $3,000 USD) and will reimburse up to $500 USD for office expenses.   🧦 Unlimited SWAGS At Appwrite, we really love Swags. Each new team member gets unlimited credits to grab any official Appwrite Swag that they wish. myJobPortals.content: SolutionsSolutionsIndustriesIndustriesCompanyCompanyDocsAPISign inGet startedOpen main menuCompanycareersJoin us in unlocking the future of payroll connectivityWe’re looking for fun, ambitious teammates to help us build the universal network for income and employment dataExplore open positions4135+Team members. Talented individuals who’ll help you grow and have fun.19Countries. Our international team is located all around the world.0Offices. We’re committed to our remote-first, asynchronous approach.Featured opportunitiesSoftware Engineer (Crawling/Reverse Engineering)Engineering$40k - $120kRemoteSee moreThe rules of our roadIn our day-to-day operations, everyone at Argyle follows a few key principles.Make new mistakesWe don’t build things perfectly the first time. We are transparent about mistakes, we fix them, and we learn from them. In other words, we make plenty of new mistakes and very few old ones.Think like an ownerEvery team member owns a part Argyle, and we each make choices that reflect that ownership. We regularly check in to determine if the decisions we’re making add value to the company and correct course if they do not.Trust by defaultWhen a fellow teammate says something, we don’t second guess them. Everyone at Argyle is in this together. We trust each other to make the right call and report back.No shortcutsGood work takes time. We don’t look for shortcuts to complete a project faster. We design deeply considered products that are built to last.Have funWe’re comfortable making jokes and maintaining good humor, even when we’re working hard. Laughter makes work more enjoyable for all of us.BenefitsWe strive to create a supportive work environment. Some of our popular perks include:Remote-first. We’ve always been a remote company, and our operations are optimized for it.Equity. We offer a meaningful stock package. Everyone is an owner.Flexible vacation policy. There are no set days off. However you use PTO is up to you.Home office allowance. Each new hire gets a stipend to set up the perfect workspace.Flexible hours. Work whenever you want. Being spread across time zones gives us that flexibility.Competitive pay. It’s important to us that everyone is compensated fairly.What Argylers say:“Argyle is a unique place where people from all walks of life and multiple locations get together to build the future of employment data.”Conor HendershotSolutions DirectorOpen positionsAll4Design0Engineering3Operations0Product0Sales & Marketing1All4Sales & Marketing$90k - $120kRemoteCustomer Success ManagerEngineering$60k - $80kRemoteData Quality Team LeadEngineering$80k - $120kRemoteEngineering ManagerEngineering$40k - $120kRemoteSoftware Engineer (Crawling/Reverse Engineering)Sign up and start buildingTry for freeAdd Argyle to your toolbox. Success Manager","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle is a fast-growing, remote-first Series B startup solving a systemic data problem.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Underneath the consumer finance industry’s decisions and processes is static, analog documentation—things like credit reports and paystubs—designed decades ago for a world that no longer exists. Meanwhile, credit bureaus buy, move, store, and sell consumers’ data without their knowledge or consent.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The result? A labyrinth of manual workflows and shortsighted underwriting models that obstruct financial access, compound operational costs, and impede innovation.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The solution is Argyle. We’re a real-time income data platform that lets our end-users instantly connect their employment records to apps and websites, so they can access and qualify for the financial resources they need to get ahead. Providers benefit from streamlined workflows and enhanced visibility that reduce costs and risk across the user journey.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our mission is to give consumers the means to exercise ownership over their income, employment, and identity data in order to create a more equal, efficient, and effective financial system for everybody.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you’re looking to join a fun and ambitious group of people working remotely across dozens of countries, apply today.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the team\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Customer Success team at Argyle combines product and industry knowledge with relationship building skills to help our customers achieve the most from the Argyle product. We believe there is incredible value in harnessing payroll information, and we help implement and support solutions for our clients to leverage that data.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What will you do?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You will be the primary point of contact for our most strategic customers and will work with them through all process stages, including integration, scaling, product expansion, and account management. You will be responsible for analyzing customer data and working directly with our product team to enhance future value. You will also be tasked with building the materials and processes to enable a repeatable customer success model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Own the customer lifecycle\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; by onboarding new clients, driving adoption, tracking renewals, and working closely with the sales team on upsells and cross-sells\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Manage and nurture multiple customer relationships\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;, including proactively and confidently engaging with key contacts to convey the value of our product\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Monitor KPIs and customer health\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; to reduce churn risk, promote retention, and improve the overall customer experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Troubleshoot and provide insights\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; on how to use the various features of our API while working closely with the support team as a point of escalation for complex issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Build the systems and processes\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;necessary to create a scalable customer success department\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What are we looking for\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of experience in a customer-facing, solution-oriented role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to develop strong, loyal, and long-lasting client relationships\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong technical acumen coupled with the desire to learn the ins and outs of Argyle\u0026#39;s API\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Exceptional ability to prioritize tasks and work independently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excitement to perform and deliver in a high-growth environment, and strive for continuous improvement\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Why Argyle?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Remote first company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;International environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Health Insurance (US residents only)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible working hours\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Stock Options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible vacation leave\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;$1000 after a month of employment to set up your home office.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MacBook\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Annual Company Performance Bonus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle embraces diversity and equal opportunity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We believe the more inclusive we are, the better our company will be.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;","departments":[{"id":4026147004,"name":"Sales \u0026 Marketing","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}],"offices":[{"id":4013029004,"name":"North America","location":"Remote","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}]},{"absolute_url":"https://boards.greenhouse.io/argyle/jobs/4360836004","data_compliance":[{"type":"gdpr","requires_consent":true,"requires_processing_consent":true,"requires_retention_consent":true,"retention_period":365}],"internal_job_id":4234267004,"location":{"name":"Remote"},"metadata":[{"id":6550730004,"name":"Salary Range","value":{"unit":"USD","max_value":"80000.0","min_value":"60000.0"},"value_type":"currency_range"},{"id":8092536004,"name":"Image URL","value":"https://res.cloudinary.com/argyle-media/image/upload/v1669731800/vacancies/software_engineer_760x330.jpg","value_type":"url"},{"id":8338443004,"name":"Featured","value":false,"value_type":"yes_no"}],"id":4360836004,"updated_at":"2023-05-22T13:44:15-04:00","requisition_id":"65","title":"Data Quality Team Lead","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;$70k - $90k per year + Stock\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Remote\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle is a fast-growing remote-first Series B startup that has reimagined how we access and use employment data.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;At Argyle, we recognize that employment data is owned by the individual it represents. By building the first gateway to employment data, we’re unlocking a dataset that has been monopolized by a single giant corporation (name omitted because of decorum) for 70 years. In turn, we’re making it easier, faster, better, wiser for innovative companies to put employment data to work for their users, enabling access to products and services that improve lives.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you rent an apartment, buy a car, refinance a home, apply for a loan — the first question you’ll often be asked, “how do you make money?“. You’d think information so foundational to our economy would be simple to manage, transfer and control — but it isn’t.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle is the easiest way for people to instantly share their income and employment data with any product or service. Users exercise complete control over how their data is accessed, and businesses receive real-time access to this data via the Argyle API.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our team is a fun and passionate group of people, working remotely across 24 countries and counting. Learn more about our team on our \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://argyle.com/about\u0026quot;\u0026gt;about\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; page.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the team\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle’s Data Quality (DQ) team works alongside our Network Growth and Scanners (Engineering, Infra, R\u0026amp;amp;D) teams. Together they form the Data build (vertical) whose mission is to achieve the maximum user conversion and the highest data quality of structured employment records available anywhere. Quality matters as much as quantity and this is where the DQ team comes in.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The team is at the very heart of our product and is responsible for data research, data knowledge management, data quality assurance and internal BI. The team’s mandate doesn’t end there with recent expansions into data engineering and automation fields. Argyle has high expectations for the team - we want DQ to become part of our common vocabulary and in turn help us shape our data strategy.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What will you do?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead and scale Argyle’s DQ team, which currently has 3 Individual Contributors (ICs)\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Initially this will be a hybrid Manager-IC role before the team reaches scale. At that point the job title will convert from DQ Team Lead to DQ Manager\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Take ownership of and drive our Data Quality KPIs working closely with Data Build’s leadership and teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive QA, automation, tooling and data engineering agenda and deliverables, incl. recruiting additional team members aligned with these domains\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build working relationships and lead collaboration with our Analytics and Documentation teams.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute towards Argyle\u0026#39;s Data Quality strategy and help with laying out key underlying initiatives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What are we looking for?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Independent self-starter - you do not wait or need to be told what to do. You are able to generate ideas, pitch them and do the necessary groundwork to get the ball rolling.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Data focused mindset. Our data is our product - it runs through our veins. You understand the purpose and significance of data (quality) management and have experience in showcasing it to different stakeholders.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Tech-first attitude. We are a software company - while we do not fear grunt work, we like efficiency. We know you’ve done it before - streamlining processes, ramping up automation and introducing smart digital tools.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Jack (or Jill) of all trades, master of some - this team has one of the broadest domains in the whole of Argyle and its Lead needs to be comfortable with this. You are not perturbed by different shades of the same colour and are happy to adapt to the evolving needs.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team Lead (with a capital L). You are a people’s person, you had the pleasure of nurturing, shaping and growing teams in the past. And you liked it.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Operating in the ‘greyzone’. We are a startup and as a result we often find ourselves in places where nobody has (ever) ventured before. And that’s okay. You are comfortable with ambiguity and tackle it with clear head. You break down complexity, shift gears quickly and come up with tangible solutions.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Why Argyle?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Remote first company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;International environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible working hours\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Stock Options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Annual Company Performance Bonus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible vacation leave\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;$1,000 after a month of employment to set up your home office.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MacBook\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle embraces diversity and equal opportunity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. data-block-id=\u0026quot;ccf9665b-3123-4edf-bee3-19de35806d62\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our mission is to give consumers the means to exercise ownership over their income, employment, and identity data in order to create a more equal, efficient, and effective financial system for everybody.\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;6da57390-b1d0-4e19-8388-696e4f91a169\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;If you’re looking to join a fun and ambitious group of people working remotely across dozens of countries, apply today.\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;4bee71fa-2424-4f0b-845e-af93d3788bd0\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;0d94cd66-4587-45bb-a5a0-f840aa1640df\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;0\u0026quot;\u0026gt;About the team\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle’s Scanner Engineering team works alongside Network Growth, Data Quality and other Scanner (Infra, R\u0026amp;amp;D) teams. Together these teams form the Data Build (think \u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;1\u0026quot;\u0026gt;vertical\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;) whose mission is to achieve the maximum user conversion and the highest data quality of structured employment records available anywhere. In layman’s terms, \u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;discussion-id-d4f43dd8-5892-4d67-8c4f-0e2e3dc2c067 notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;3\u0026quot;\u0026gt;the Data Build owns data lifecycle\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt; - from initial research to development of data acquisition tools to production support. Scanner Engineering team’s remit includes the development of scanners, implementation of new features in existing scanners and continuous improvement and support of overall scanner estate.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;fa58a882-8cde-4717-a0f7-627157e19729\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;On a day-to-day basis, the team operates as a number of squads which helps us to remain focused, organized and offers some level of specialization among the engineers. Finally, we strive to operate in a flat hierarchy approach. This means that we shy away from pass down task allocation but rather embrace grass roots problem solving - our goal is to ensure that everyone can contribute to the success of the team and wider company.\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;f5d3d142-b070-493c-8259-2f21d918a99a\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;f0d89bee-a3dd-4baf-b23e-9210a8f083ad\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;0\u0026quot;\u0026gt;What will you do?\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;af4ef1bd-d5e2-49e2-aaea-d437777b263e\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;pseudoSelection\u0026quot; data-content-editable-void=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot; data-text-edit-side=\u0026quot;start\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;pseudoBefore\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage day-to-day running of multiple scanner engineering squads - ensure that work pipeline is efficient, appropriately documented, prioritized and distributed.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Look after our people - take the full ownership of people management, including performance management, training needs and talent development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Execute delivery - analyse, plan and gauge the progress of work, own the cadence measures, reporting and communication to a range of stakeholders.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a part of Data Build leadership team - help to set appropriate OKRs (\u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;1\u0026quot;\u0026gt;aka goals\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;), shape the short term strategy, priorities and schedule of work.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead initiatives where appropriate - manage the delivery plans and measure progress of new feature development (which usually involves multiple teams from all across the company).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;bcd137e4-2a63-4bb8-a00c-657b6c924e4f\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;bcd137e4-2a63-4bb8-a00c-657b6c924e4f\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What are we looking for?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;c8baf10f-9575-44e2-9a04-3b9e420f3dea\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;pseudoSelection\u0026quot; data-content-editable-void=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot; data-text-edit-side=\u0026quot;start\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;pseudoBefore\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Tech savvy. Python is not a snake, protobuf is not from Star Trek and Kafka is not a famous author. You have had your share of exposure to different software solutions, you know your tech and are comfortable in discussions around it. You understand the ins and outs of \u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;1\u0026quot;\u0026gt;n\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;-tier architecture, source control, CI/CD and the pain points of SDLC. Bonus points: Experience in reverse engineering\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maximiser. Our company is built on our software - and we are precious about it. You understand the significance of software (\u0026amp;amp; data) quality, and are enthusiastic about maintaining the high standards. Keeping the (bright) lights on and pushing the needle is part of your ethos.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team Lead (with a capital L). You are a people’s person, you had the pleasure of nurturing, shaping and growing teams in the past. And you liked it.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Building on solid foundations. While we do not fear grunt work, we like efficiency. We know you’ve done it before - you’ve helped software engineers through process streamlining, automation ramp up and introduction of smart software tools.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Operating in the ‘greyzone’. We are a startup and as a result we often find ourselves in places where nobody has (ever) ventured before. And that’s okay. You are comfortable with ambiguity and tackle it with clear head. You break down complexity, shift gears quickly and come up with tangible solutions.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;ef00e8ce-6a5f-4ed1-bed2-684ad73e3edd\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;ef00e8ce-6a5f-4ed1-bed2-684ad73e3edd\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;9dc2966f-870a-43aa-9e26-d606b91037b9\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;discussion-id-901d7e09-6212-404d-8275-0c0ac597734d notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;0\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Why Argyle?\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span class=\u0026quot;discussion-id-901d7e09-6212-404d-8275-0c0ac597734d notion-enable-hover\u0026quot; data-token-index=\u0026quot;0\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Remote first company\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;International environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Flexible working hours\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Stock Options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Flexible vacation leave\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;$1,000 after a month of employment to set up your home office\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MacBook\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li class=\u0026quot;notranslate\u0026quot; data-content-editable-leaf=\u0026quot;true\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Annual Company Performance Bonus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;92708cef-d9cf-49dd-88f8-eb53c06b23fa\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-bulleted_list-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;92708cef-d9cf-49dd-88f8-eb53c06b23fa\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Argyle embraces diversity and equal opportunity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We believe the more inclusive we are, the better our company will be.\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div class=\u0026quot;notion-selectable notion-text-block\u0026quot; data-block-id=\u0026quot;c83dce9c-7664-40a2-bf1d-337f9343d935\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;div\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/div\u0026gt;","departments":[{"id":4026143004,"name":"Engineering","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}],"offices":[{"id":4013277004,"name":"Global","location":"Remote","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}]},{"absolute_url":"https://boards.greenhouse.io/argyle/jobs/4118171004","data_compliance":[{"type":"gdpr","requires_consent":false,"requires_processing_consent":false,"requires_retention_consent":false,"retention_period":null}],"internal_job_id":4083808004,"location":{"name":"Remote"},"metadata":[{"id":6550730004,"name":"Salary Range","value":{"unit":"USD","max_value":"120000.0","min_value":"40000.0"},"value_type":"currency_range"},{"id":8092536004,"name":"Image URL","value":"https://res.cloudinary.com/argyle-media/image/upload/v1669731800/vacancies/software_engineer_760x330.jpg","value_type":"url"},{"id":8338443004,"name":"Featured","value":true,"value_type":"yes_no"}],"id":4118171004,"updated_at":"2023-03-21T13:32:23-04:00","requisition_id":"1","title":"Software Engineer (Crawling/Reverse Engineering)","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle is a fast-growing, remote-first Series B startup solving a systemic data problem.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Underneath the consumer finance industry’s decisions and processes is static, analog documentation—things like credit reports and paystubs—designed decades ago for a world that no longer exists. Meanwhile, credit bureaus buy, move, store, and sell consumers’ data without their knowledge or consent.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The result? A labyrinth of manual workflows and shortsighted underwriting models that obstruct financial access, compound operational costs, and impede innovation.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The solution is Argyle. We’re a real-time income data platform that lets our end-users instantly connect their employment records to apps and websites, so they can access and qualify for the financial resources they need to get ahead. Providers benefit from streamlined workflows and enhanced visibility that reduce costs and risk across the user journey.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our mission is to give consumers the means to exercise ownership over their income, employment, and identity data in order to create a more equal, efficient, and effective financial system for everybody.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you’re looking to join a fun and ambitious group of people working remotely across dozens of countries, apply today.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the team\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our Scanner Engineering squads work on building and maintaining integrations to various systems. This means reverse engineering platforms and solving complex problems daily. A passion for this work brings our team from across the globe.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You will join a team of exceptionally talented engineers constantly looking for solutions to new problems and innovative ways to meet our business needs. Scrapers (we call them Scanners) are at the core of our business. This means you will join our pivotal engineering team and have a real impact on Argyle\u0026#39;s success.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What will you do?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will create, own and maintain Scanners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will be contributing to general improvements such as shared libraries \u0026amp;amp; frameworks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will be closely working and communicating across different teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our Stack\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Python is our main language.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Python libraries we use: Celery, Pydantic, Playwright, BeautifulSoup, Asyncio, Httpx, Pydash, Mypy, Pytest, Poetry, Pyenv, Poppler, PdfMiner.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We run Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, Github, ArgoCD.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you are familiar with some of these - great! The rest you can learn after joining.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Python coding experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Reverse Engineering of JS/WebApps\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ideally, experience with building web scrapers - if not, curiosity to learn\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to think fast and to manage rapid changes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ownership over your work\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Focusing on solutions, not pointing out problems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Bonus points for\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with Android/iOS device verification frameworks (SafetyNet Attestation/DeviceCheck) and ways to bypass them\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Knowledge of Bot and Captcha bypass mitigation tactics\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Why Argyle?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Remote first company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;International environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible working hours\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Stock Options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Annual Company Performance Bonus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible vacation leave\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;$1000 after a month of employment to set up your home office.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MacBook\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Argyle embraces diversity and equal opportunity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We believe the more inclusive we are, the better our company will be.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;","departments":[{"id":4026143004,"name":"Engineering","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}],"offices":[{"id":4013277004,"name":"Global","location":"Remote","child_ids":[],"parent_id":null}]}],"meta":{"total":4}},"nav":{"navigation":{"signInUrl":"https://console.argyle.com/sign-in","systemStatusUrl":"https://status.argyle.com/","openNetworkUrl":"","docsUrl":"https://argyle.com/docs","useCasesUrl":"use-cases","toolsUrl":"tools","industriesUrl":"industries","companyUrl":"company","ctaButton":[{"text":"Get started","url":"https://console.argyle.com/sign-up"}]},"industries":[{"slug":"mortgage","name":"Mortgage","icon":[{"name":"mortgage"}]},{"slug":"lending","name":"Lending","icon":[{"name":"lending-alt"}]},{"slug":"banking","name":"Banking","icon":[{"name":"bank"}]},{"slug":"gig-economy","name":"Gig Economy","icon":[{"name":"bike"}]},{"slug":"background-check","name":"Background Check","icon":[{"name":"checkmark-alt"}]}],"useCases":[{"slug":"verification-income-and-employment","name":"Income \u0026 Employment Verification","icon":[{"name":"checkmark"}]},{"slug":"deposit-switching","name":"Deposit Switching","icon":[{"name":"deposit-switch-alt"}]},{"slug":"paycheck-linked-lending","name":"Paycheck-Linked Lending","icon":[{"name":"paycheck-linked"}]},{"slug":"earned-wage-access","name":"Earned Wage Access","icon":[{"name":"wallet"}]}],"tools":[{"name":"Argyle Link","slug":"link","icon":[{"name":"link"}]},{"name":"Console","slug":"console","icon":[{"name":"developers"}]},{"name":"API","slug":"api","icon":[{"name":"api-reference"}]}],"announcement":{"description":"Setting Today’s Mortgage Lenders Up for Success","prefix":"Webinar | May 16th @ 12 p.m. ET:","url":"https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/3016820013788/WN_-zLrlDRJRuWui6lbGXQ0QA","isShown":false}}},"__N_SSG":true},"page":"/careers","query":{},"buildId":"VBKgWOtPpO_GpefiI7K7w","isFallback":false,"gsp":true,"scriptLoader":[]}

About Articulate
Our Values

Careers
Contact Us







We’re changing  the way the world learns, together
Join the team revolutionizing online learning.
Open Positions
































Discover the Articulate difference
Here are a few reasons why we’re one of Inc. Magazine’s Best Workplaces of 2022.





Make an impact
What you do every day matters. More than 122 million learners in 167 countries have learned new skills, gained new insight, and received career-boosting training made possible by Articulate.


Work anywhere
You'll be part of a team that knows how to do remote right. We've always been fully remote and have nearly two decades of experience under our belts. Read our CEO's articles on remote work, or listen to her interview with the Wall Street Journal's "As We Work" podcast, for insight into our remote environment.




Grow your career
We believe that when we work to improve ourselves, we build a better world. That’s why we offer tuition reimbursement, professional coaching, and internal training opportunities for all employees.


Love your team
You'll work with our team of trustworthy, thoughtful doers with big hearts and exceptional minds.







Our culture sets us apart
Being a human-centered organization means that people are at the heart of everything we do.



















Enjoy super benefits
We're committed to helping our people live healthy, happy lives.





Student Loan Assistance Program
Get up to $2,400 annually ($200/month) in student loan assistance.


Flexible PTO
Take time when you need it. Go on a vacation, stay in bed when you're sick, or volunteer in your community. We believe in work-life balance.


Fully remote
We're 100% remote—and always have been. We'll help set up your home office with awesome equipment and technology.


Well-being benefit
We support our employees' well-being, however they define “well-being”. We offer $100 a month toward items and services that support emotional, physical, environmental, social, financial, intellectual, and spiritual well-being.



Medical insurance


1



We offer Fortune 500-level medical, dental, and vision coverage for our employees and their dependents.


Baby bonding leave
We offer a baby bonding benefit of up to 17 weeks paid leave to primary and non-primary caregivers.


Child care assistance
We offer all employees up to $3,000 tax-free annually for child care assistance.


Family planning benefit
We will be reimbursing employees and their partners out-of-pocket expenses as they relate to fertility, family building, pregnancy and ongoing care to a lifetime maximum of $50,000.


Tuition reimbursement
Continue your education in any subject you want. We provide up to $5,250/year for classes at a code school or accredited college or university.


Transgender benefit
We offer medical coverage for gender-affirming surgery and supplemental procedures, along with paid leave for recovery.


Company matching donations
We match up to $500 of employee donations each calendar year to nonprofit organizations.




401(k) savings
Contribute to your choice of Fidelity 401k plans. Articulate will also contribute 3% of your salary to your 401k whether you decide to contribute or not.


Supplemental insurance
Give your loved ones peace of mind. We provide life, AD&D, short-term disability, and long-term disability benefits to all employees.


Mental health sessions
We cover 100% of eleven therapy sessions and eleven therapeutic coaching sessions per year with a licensed therapist through the Modern Health platform for each employee and their dependents.


Health savings account (HSA)
We contribute $1000 for family and $500 for individuals annually to help cover co-pays and other medical expenses.


Life coaching
Get coaching in social, physical, financial, and mental well-being. We offer unlimited life-coaching sessions with certified coaches through the Wellness Coach platform.


Birthday/event celebration
We value our employees and the important milestones in their lives. We celebrate with cupcakes, Slack shoutouts, and virtual parties.


Development
We support the growth and development of our employees through coaching, internal training, and skills training opportunities.


Volunteer time
We offer our employees time off to volunteer in meaningful ways within their communities and beyond.


Service sabbatical
We offer service sabbaticals to support our employees in doing the work to advance human rights, civil rights, and environmental health.


Cash for Change
Our employee-guided corporate giving program supports organizations advancing human rights, civil rights, and environmental health.


Abortion travel assistance
We offer $4,000 annually to travel to seek legal abortion services.









Make meaningful connections
Connect and kick back with your awesome teammates at in-person retreats, virtual gaming events, dynamic team-building sessions, group wellness activities, and more.



Our hiring process











Apply

Learn about roles at Articulate and apply for a role when you see one that's a great fit.














Screening call

Meet with a member of our recruiting team to learn about Articulate culture and get more details on the role.
















Initial interview

Get to know the role's hiring manager in a deep discussion about the role, the team, and the opportunity for impact.

























Technical challenge or project

We'll ask you to tackle a technical challenge or project to assess your skill set/experience.
















Final interview

Meet with the hiring team for intros, dig into the project, learn more about the team, pair programming (if technical role) and give us all a feel for what it's like to work together.












Offer

If the hiring team decides to move forward, the recruiting team will extend an offer, handle salary negotiation, and kick off the onboarding process.






Join our team
Our people are trustworthy, thoughtful, doers. These are the core attributes we look for when we hire, and we expect people to embody these attributes throughout their journey with us. See if there's a role that's right for you on our Rise.com and Articulate 360 teams.
The Articulate Talent Acquisition team will only communicate using an @articulate.com or noreply@greenhouse.io email address.

The machine readable files are formatted to allow researchers, regulators, and application developers to more easily access and analyze data.

    function setUpFooterChat() {

        liveagent.showWhenOnline(chatTypes.sales, laBtnOnlineFooter);
        liveagent.showWhenOnline(chatTypes.sales, laBtnOnlineFooterMobile);
      }

    function setUpChat() {
      const laBtnOnline = $("[data-liveagent-online-container]");
      const laBtnOffline = $("[data-liveagent-offline-container]");
  
      if (laBtnOnline.length) {
        laBtnOnline.map((index, _element) => {
          const chatType = laBtnOnline[index].dataset.liveagentChatType;
  
          if (inEnglishSpeakingLocale) {
            if (laBtnOffline[index] !== undefined) {
              liveagent.showWhenOffline(chatTypes[chatType], laBtnOffline[index]);
            }
  
            liveagent.showWhenOnline(chatTypes[chatType], laBtnOnline[index]);
          }
        });
      }
    }
  
    function setLiveAgentOptionsAndShowStatus() {
      if (!window._laq) {
        window._laq = [];
      }
  
      window._laq.push(() => {

        setUpChat();
  
        liveagent.setChatWindowHeight(840);
        liveagent.setChatWindowWidth(550);
      });
    }
  
    function initializeLiveAgent() {
      liveagent.init(
        "https://d.la3-c1-ia5.salesforceliveagent.com/chat",
        "5723300000000M7",
        "00D300000000Txo"
      );
    }
  
    function setUpLiveAgent(retryCount = 0, lastError = null) {
      const maxRetriesLastingFiveSeconds = 50;
  
      try {
        initializeLiveAgent();
        setLiveAgentOptionsAndShowStatus();
      } catch (error) {
        if (retryCount < maxRetriesLastingFiveSeconds) {
          setTimeout(() => setUpLiveAgent(retryCount + 1, error), 100);
        } else {
          throw new Error(`Error setting up Live Agent. Error: ${lastError}`);
        }
      }
    }
  
    function startChat() {
      $("[data-liveagent-trigger]").on("click", function (event) {

        liveagent.startChatWithWindow(chatTypes[chatType], "articulateChat");
      });
    }
  
    setUpLiveAgent();
